pr_title: chore(clients/java): enforce API stability in Java code

chore(project): enforce stability of Java public API

timeline.bodyText: Will this be updated when we release, or do we need to update this manually? I assume the latter?
timeline.author: npepinpe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -102,9 +102,13 @@
     <plugin.version.dependency>3.1.1</plugin.version.dependency>
     <plugin.version.spotbugs>3.1.12.2</plugin.version.spotbugs>
     <plugin.version.sonar>3.7.0.1746</plugin.version.sonar>
+    <plugin.version.clirr>2.8</plugin.version.clirr>
 
     <!-- maven extensions -->
     <extension.version.os-maven-plugin>1.6.2</extension.version.os-maven-plugin>

+    <!-- version against which backwards compatibility is checked -->

replies.bodyText: Thanks for pointing this out. Please check the latest commit, when releasing the version will be updated to the release version
replies.author: MiguelPires
